caption: Pro-Choice Activist proudly breaks world record by getting her 27th abortion

result.explanation: This assessment is knowledge-based. The caption is highly implausible and almost certainly false.  There is no verifiable record of anyone proudly boasting about having 27 abortions, and such a claim would be highly controversial and likely to generate significant media coverage if true. The phrase "pro-choice activist" is used in an attempt to justify the action, but the context is inappropriate and sensationalizes a sensitive issue.  The sheer number of abortions mentioned (27) is also extremely unusual and highly unlikely.

The sheer number of abortions mentioned is highly unusual and casts doubt on the credibility of the whole claim. There is no external evidence to support this claim, rendering this news caption completely fabricated and misleading.
